findings.title: Missing functionality
findings.description: Functions emit Transfer event but do not change any balances, leading to possible double-spending or reduction of usersâ€™ rewards.

findings.title: Excluding from receiving rewards logic is corrupted
findings.description: User's reflection balance updates along with their prime balance after excluding and including them back, leading to unexpected behavior.

findings.title: Operation between different time units
findings.description: block.timestamp may be bigger than startTime plus initialLock in seconds, but initialLock is given in days, leading to unexpected unlocking of funds or reverting the transaction.

findings.title: Significant impact on market price
findings.description: Functions change the balances of all users at one moment, which could be used for changing market price significantly and looting untrained users.

findings.title: A new vesting period may not be created
findings.description: locks mapping is not cleared on finishing of the vesting period, so the owner will not be able to set new vesting for the same user.

findings.title: No checks to prevent percentage overflow
findings.description: Fees may become more than 100%, leading to reverting of all transactions.
findings.location: FidoMeta.sol, functions: setCommunityCharge, setEcoSysFee, setSurcharge1, setSurcharge2, setSurcharge3

findings.title: User balance may exceed the total supply
findings.description: If the owner excludes himself from rewards and then burns all tokens, the total supply will be lower than the sum of user balances.

findings.title: Integer Underflow
findings.description: Transaction may be reverted due to underflow if a user unlocks vesting firstly in the first four months and then in the sixth month or later.

findings.title: Missing management of excluded accounts
findings.description: Adding excluded accounts to _excluded array is missed, leading to wrong rates calculation, unexpected contract behavior, and possible reentrancy attacks.

findings.title: A new vesting period may not be created ( duplicate )
findings.description: locks mapping is not cleared on finishing of the vesting period, so the owner will not be able to set new vesting for the same user.

findings.title: Old wallets are not included back to changes and rewards
findings.description: Functions set new wallets and exclude them from charging but do not include the old ones back.

findings.title: Unprotected access to wallet settings
findings.description: Unrestricted access to wallet variables

findings.title: Unnecessary public functions
findings.description: Public functions not used within the contract

findings.title: Unused variables
findings.description: Variables defined but not used in the contract

findings.title: Template code
findings.description: Using costly reassignment operations and changing/reverting values for special calls

findings.title: Overwhelmed code
findings.description: Unneeded reassignment and unused variables

findings.title: Repeated code
findings.description: Duplicate operation (updating r-space balance) in multiple functions

findings.title: Unnecessary code
findings.description: Unused else case in transfer function

findings.title: Functions that can be declared as external
findings.description: Public functions not called in the contract should be declared as external

findings.title: Unnecessary checks
findings.description: Redundant checks for each fee separately

findings.title: Modification of well-known contract
findings.description: Modified imported contract (Ownable) with unused variable

findings.title: Hardcoded values
findings.description: Hardcoded decimals value making development harder and code less readable

findings.title: Local variable shadowing
findings.description: Shadowed local variables

findings.title: Non-Constant State Variables
findings.description: State variables that are not marked as constant
